Judul: GEOLOGI DAERAH CIBINGBIN DAN SEKITARNYA, KABUPATEN KUNINGAN, JAWA BARAT
Abstrak:
Research area located in Cibingbin Area and surroundings, Kuningan District,   West Java, within coordinate 9220500-9215000 mU dan 245000-250000 mT UTM wgs   84 zone 49, total area  27.5 km2.       
 
 

The research area located in Antiklinorium Bogor-North Serayu -Kendeng Zone.   Research area has a type of river flow patterns rektangular. This pattern is controlled by  geological structures that develop in the area of research. Based on the results of the   analysis of topographic maps and observations that have been made in the field, the   geomorphology research area is divided into four geomorfological units classification   based on Lobeck (1939). Which are Folds Hills Unit, Folds Plain Unit, Homoklin Hills       
 
 

Unit, and Alluvial Plain Unit.       
 
 

Stratigraphy of research area consists of deposit series start from Late Miocene to Middle Pliocen. Stratigraphy of research area can be divided into five litostratigraphyunits by field observation, lithology characteristic, and age. Which are from old to young: Claystone Unit, Sandstone-Claystone Unit, Breccia Units, Breccia-Sandstone Unit, and Alluvial Unit. All itostratigraphy units in the research area deposit in deep water environment.Geological structure formation took place during Plio-Pleistocene deformation  periods. Geological Structures in research area area are thrust faults, strike-slip faults,and folds trending northwest-southeast and northeast-southwest. and strike-slip faults.Right-slip faults in the research area formed by tear fault mechanism. This presented by difference of folding geometry that indicating difference of accomodation force at the two blocks which separated by those faults.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing :Dr. Ir Asep Heri Patria Kesumajana ,MT.
Kata Kunci: Cibingbin, Halang Formation, deep water, tear fault
